Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A set of {? | $(this.app:finger) | $(this.app:finger) |} fingers, with {? | $(this.app:nail) | $(this.app:nail) |} nails at the ends.
A set of {? | $(this.app:finger) | $(this.app:finger) |} fingers, with {? | $(this.app:nail) | $(this.app:nail) |} nails at the ends.
The arms and legs, together with their hands, feet, elbows, knees, etc..
The little fingers of the hands, with {? | $(this.app:nail) | $(this.app:nail) |} nails at the ends.
The little finger on a hand, with a {? | $(this.app:nail) | $(this.app:nail) |} nail at the end.
The triangular bones across the upper back of the body, connected to the collarbone.
A temple, to one side of the forehead.
A pair of temples, on either side of the forehead.

Core:Properties.Core:Property:

D=back detail trigger.
*/
Call( this, "adjective", \$detail: "back" );
